Author: NenPractitioner
Text: I experienced heated blankets and they are amazing almost too amazing because getting out of bed would be harder but I’m too paranoid and OCD to get one myself. 🤷🏻‍♀️

Author: bir_die
Text: Heated blankets are also a godsend!!!! If you’re rolling in cash, you could also layer up with a heating pad.   They’re also made to be washable, so if you do the Ultimate Combo with the heated water bottle, you don’t even need to worry about electrocution if it explodes.   Though your hands and feet will forever be cold. :^)
